summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 3, McGraw's Washington Park Addition, being the block bounded on the north by East Ward Street; on the west by Washington Boulevard and on the south by East Madison Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7257, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
